Player History
Drafted in 29th round, 450th overall pick, by Boston in 2015...
Was claimed off waivers by Houston on 4/12/2015.
Released by Houston on 4/27/2015...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 5/1/2015 to a 1-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 5/7/2015, off John Whitlow (ATL)...
10/22/2015: Signed a contract extension with Philadelphia, $1,000,000 per year, for 2 years.
Hit first career homerun on 8/12/2016, off Oliver Encarnacion (DET)...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/2/2018 to a 2-year deal worth $1,500,000 per year...
Traded from Philadelphia to Cincinnati on 4/6/2018 (Going to CIN: CF Manuel Rentas. Going to PHI: RF Todd Gilmore)...
Injured on 7/4/2018 with a Broken Foot, out for 7 weeks...
Was claimed off waivers by St. Louis (C) on 7/31/2019.
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/17/2020 to a 4-year deal worth $650,000 per year...
Was claimed off waivers by Seattle on 3/2/2020.
Injured on 4/20/2023 with a Pulled Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
